Travel plans

09 January 2016 on trips

I'm officially starting my trips for the year in one week. The first stop will be in Lima, Peru.

I'll stay there for a month. I've never spent that much time abroad before, and I'm looking forward to see if I can get used to travel "minimalistically".

When I traveled for work, I did it with my Timbuk2 command backpack and the bundle technique, but it was mostly for a few days. Now that I'll stay for longer time, I may have to get me a bigger bag. We'll see.

The list:

  1. Clothes (laundry once a week):
    1. 3 t-shirts
    2. 2 long sleeve shirts
    3. 1 dress shirt
    4. 1 baseball cap
    5. 1 winter hat
    6. 2 pairs of jeans
    7. 1 pair of shorts
    8. Underwear for 7 days
    9. 1 rain jacket
    10. 1 fleece jacket
    11. 1 pair of nike free
    12. 1 pair of hiking boots
  2. Accessories
    1. Toothbrush
    2. Electric razor and charger
    3. Pouch for passport, small cash, ids, etc.
    4. Notepad and pen
    5. Soap bar
    6. Towel
  3. Electronics
    1. Tablet/laptop
    2. Tablet pen
    3. Portable mouse
    4. Unlocked smartphone
    5. Hot-spot
    6. 6000mAh battery
    7. USB fan
    8. MS Band
    9. USB drive
    10. Point and shoot camera
    11. SD cards
    12. Chargers and cables
    13. Noise canceling headphones
